channel.title: Dodian duel stealing
channel.description:
okay i am using devolution v7 and found a glitch where you can jack the player's item. so here's how the glitch works.
1. you duel sum1. 2. they stake you a dragon chainbody 3. you accept the duel. 4. you click the report abuse button during the duel 5. AND YOU GET THE DRAGON CHAINBODY AND THE DUEL GET'S CANCELED!!!!!
how do i make it so you cannot open the "report abuse" interface while dueling?

item.title: Dodian duel stealing
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Its called duping. Both players get the item lol. Just remove dueling?

Read full topic

That is duping, both players get the item.

item.title: Dodian duel stealing
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

but they don’t dupe. they duel u, they offer an item, and when the duel starts u click report abuse and u get there item. theres no duping involved.

Read full topic
